metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Wall and near HAG SurvivorsPlease rename to Moorino being scanned by Steel Watcher

0.speaker: Moorino
0.text: I don't have time for this. That pile of junk is done interrogating innocent citizens.

1.speaker: Moorino
1.text: Gods, this is totally obnoxious. But I guess I'd better just keep my lips sewn shut, eh?
